original_title: 日清焼そばU.F.O.　未確認藤岡物体襲来
overview: June 24th is the day the first UFO was spotted. Around the same time, UFOs were also discovered in Japan. That's right, an unidentified Fujioka object. Why did they come, and what is their purpose... What will happen on UFO Day?
title: Nissin Yakisoba U.F.O. - Unidentified Fujioka Object
